Controls the AddAppointment screen

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    allFieldsFilled()
    Checks if all fields are filled on the screen Used to successfully add a new appointment(appointment can't be added if a field is empty)
    Boolean
    appointmentOverlap()
    Checks if the new appointment times overlap with an existing appointment Based on conflicting start/end times for other appointments
    void
    cancelOnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Controls the click action for the cancel button Loads the main console when clicked and doesn't add an appointment
    void
    displayAlert(int alertSelected)
    Contains all custom error checks for this screen Errors selected based on appropriate scenarios
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes the form Adds appropriate values to each combo box (start/end times, contacts, user/customer id's)
    void
    saveOnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Saves a new appointment with a random, unique id Contains error checking for business hours, business days, invalid entries and appointment overlaps Uses error messages from the displayAlerts function Loads new appointment data into the appointments table in the database
